cluster_classes.class_description: Fictional characters and character groups that appear within the Snow White fairy tale narrative.
cluster_classes.evidence_excerpt: Snow White, her wicked stepmother the evil queen, seven dwarfs, and a handsome prince in the Snow White fairy tale.

members.entity_description: A beautiful princess who flees into the forest to escape her wicked stepmother, the evil queen, in the Snow White fairy tale.
The wicked stepmother of Snow White and the primary antagonist in the Snow White fairy tale.
A group of seven dwarfs who assist Snow White against the evil queen.
The prince with whom Snow White finds her happily ever after.

cluster_classes.class_description: Emotion and outcome states that are central to the Snow White story’s conflict and resolution.
cluster_classes.evidence_excerpt: Snow White ultimately triumphs over the queen's jealousy and finds her happily ever after.

members.entity_description: The jealousy harbored by the evil queen toward Snow White.
The happy final state Snow White attains at the end of the story.

args.justification: Assign a clear higher-level Class_Group to connect Snow White characters with other Snow White–related classes in the schema.
Align Snow White narrative state concepts under the same Snow White Fairy Tale Class_Group as the character class to reflect their shared narrative domain.

executed_decisions.justification: Assign a clear higher-level Class_Group to connect Snow White characters with other Snow White–related classes in the schema.
Align Snow White narrative state concepts under the same Snow White Fairy Tale Class_Group as the character class to reflect their shared narrative domain.
